mapper.select: SELECT question.id as qId, question.uid,question.title,question.type,question.content,question.answer,question.collect,question.readcount,question.hotnum,question.price,question.deep,question.qustype,(tmeet+smeet+pmeet) as meet,question.good,question.gmt_create, user.nickname, user.avatar,(select count(reply.id) from red_ask_reply reply where reply.qid=question.id) as reply,tag.id as ctid,tag.name as tname,tag.img as timg,tag.sort as tsort FROM red_interview_question question LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_user user ON question.uid=user.id LEFT OUTER JOIN red_interview_tags tags ON tags.qid = question.id LEFT OUTER JOIN red_category_tag tag ON tag.id = tags.tid WHERE question.id=#{tId}
